name: Lasers: Extreme Edition
description:
This application is intended for entertainment purposes only. This application is NOT a laser pointer! It is a photo editing application that allows you to add laser images to existing photos.

Do you want to prank your friends or family? Do you love lasers? Now you can create photos that will create awesome photos like a fake laser shooting your friend. Or you can place a laser image on photo to point an object or appear like a lightsaber. It is fun for kids and adults!

Use your own photos to create a fun laser photo. Blast your friends with laser rifles, create heat ray vision like Superman, and more!

It's fun for all ages. First, select a photo, then choose a laser, and make your photo an awesome laser fight!

1) Choose photo
2) Select a laser
3) Add laser to photo and share!
